Name: Gingerbread Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare skewered crystallised ginger for garnish.
Review: Warming ginger spice and rich butterscotch laced with bourbon, harmonised by apple juice.
History: Created by yours truly. I revisited this cocktail in February 2024, 20 years after I created it. The 2004 recipe was 45ml (1½oz) Bourbon, 22.5ml (¾oz) butterscotch liqueur, 22.5ml (¾oz) ginger wine, and 60ml (2oz) apple juice.
Nutrition: One serving of Gingerbread Cocktail contains 160 calories
